Html:
Hi,

Long time Wabbitemu user here. Today when I tried downloading and installing Wabbitemu from scratch on Windows 7 Home Edition 32 bits, I received the following error message when trying to install the ROM from open source: "Unable to download file".

I have never encountered this error message before. Any ideas what it might be or how to resolve it? I have an active functional internet connection and have installed all major Windows updates.

Please help!
Thanks,
Chris

Hi,
I think the problem is not the ROM, the problem is downloading the operation system from ti's website. I downloaded the os manually: ttps://education.ti.com/en/us/software/details/en/B7DADA7FD4AA40CE9D7911B004B8C460/ti84plusoperatingsystem (select "continue as guest" when asked to login). Now when running setup wizard you select "browse for os files on my computer" and select the downloaded file. This resolved the problem in my case...
Anna
Hello all, this should be fixed in the new version
